title: Ep190 Military Murderers
description: This week, the gals enlist to discuss some pretty dark cases of sadistic soldiers. Topics include the toxic culture at Fort Hood, a sloppy higher-up coverup, and a shocking attack that was almost never solved. Fill your canteen with Winc's Declassé Red Blend, always check your six, and tune in for Military Murderers. For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
